title: Did a 1912 newspaper article predict global warming?
subtitle: A press clipping from 1912 predicts the possibility of global warming of coal burning is real and consistent with the history of climate science.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: An article published on August 14, 1912 in the New Zealand newspaper contains a brief story of how the burning of coal can produce future warming by adding carbon dioxide to the atmosphere.
